name: schemative
description: Declarative schemas with propTypes, default values and transformers
author: sospedra <sospedra.r@gmail.com>

scripts.test: npm run test:cs && npm run test:unit && npm run test:coverage
scripts.minify: uglifyjs lib/schemative.js --compress --preamble '//schemative, MIT, https://github.com/sospedra/schemative' --source-map lib/schemative.js.map --in-source-map lib/schemative.js.map --mangle -o lib/schemative.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run minify
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
